1.instruction:
Redesign the existing cafe website for Kawiarnia Fabryczna with a completely unique theme and design, while maintaining GitHub Pages compatibility.

**Requirements:**
- Transform the existing toMy Kawiarnia website infrastructure into Kawiarnia Fabryczna
- Create a UNIQUE design theme (different from the black/white theme) - research Kawiarnia Fabryczna's brand identity from their social media
- Technology: Keep Shadcn-ui, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, maintain GitHub Pages compatibility
- Design: Modern, unique, user-friendly, responsive

**New Content:**
- Cafe name: Fabryczna (or Kawiarnia Fabryczna)
- Phone: +48 692 431 717
- Address: Fabryczna 28/30, 00-446 Warszawa
- Hours: Mon-Fri 7:30am-6pm, Sat-Sun 8:30am-5pm
- Logo: https://scontent-waw2-2.cdninstagram.com/v/t51.2885-19/1171061_303443903192559_1066918953_a.jpg?efg=eyJ2ZW5jb2RlX3RhZyI6InByb2ZpbGVfcGljLmRqYW5nby4xNTAuYzIifQ&_nc_ht=scontent-waw2-2.cdninstagram.com&_nc_cat=103&_nc_oc=Q6cZ2QFVC99pqajK2Y4izpAu7_E_Zer-G2RnF5PqxWE8-N8tU6LINV1ti89WZ5NVYp6G2H0&_nc_ohc=K9MTQM1CotUQ7kNvwGdkkff&_nc_gid=qTixQ5mdRnYsWQGCLjb2Wg&edm=APoiHPcBAAAA&ccb=7-5&oh=00_AfhgyKsvLmsJ_8SPcOP-eCf1FRLfSVVWfBIxtg7OfGKDMg&oe=6920FA8F&_nc_sid=22de04

**Source links for research and real photos:**
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kawiarniafabryczna/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kawiarniafabryczna/?locale=pl_PL
- Kawowa Mapa: https://www.kawowamapa.pl/kawiarni/kawiarnia-fabryczna/
- Ziarno w Kubek: https://ziarnowkubek.pl/kawiarnia/81,kawiarnia-fabryczna

**Tasks:**
1. Research Kawiarnia Fabryczna's brand identity, color palette, and atmosphere from social media
2. Download REAL photos from Instagram/Facebook showing cafe interior, coffee, food, atmosphere
3. Download the logo from the provided URL
4. Design a UNIQUE theme reflecting Kawiarnia Fabryczna's brand (analyze their colors, style, atmosphere from photos)
5. Update all content (name, address, phone, hours) throughout the website
6. Research and update menu/offerings based on what they actually serve
7. Replace all images with real Kawiarnia Fabryczna photos
8. Update all 4 language translations (Polish, Ukrainian, English, Turkish)
9. Maintain the same website structure (Hero, About, Menu, Gallery, Contact sections)
10. Ensure GitHub Pages compatibility (static site, proper routing, relative paths)

**Important:**
- Use ONLY real photos from Kawiarnia Fabryczna's social media
- Create a unique design that's distinctly different from toMy Kawiarnia
- Research their actual menu offerings - don't make assumptions
- Keep the multilingual support
- Maintain GitHub Pages infrastructure

The plan has been confirmed with the user. No need to ask human or draft plan again. Proceed directly.

2.instruction:
CRITICAL: Replace ALL AI-generated placeholder images with REAL photos from toMy Kawiarnia Warszawa's social media and verify menu accuracy.

**Image Sources to Use:**
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tomy_kawiarnia_warszawa/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/toMyKawiarniaWarszawa/mentions/
- Foundation website: https://fundacjalenygrochowskiej.pl/kat-aktualnosci/otwieramy-tomy-kawiarnia-w-sercu-warszawy/

**Required Actions:**
1. Download REAL photos from the cafe's Instagram and Facebook pages showing:
   - Actual cafe interior/atmosphere
   - Real coffee being prepared/served
   - Actual pastries and desserts they serve
   - Real ceramic workshop photos
   - Real team members working
   - Actual logo from https://www.facebook.com/photo/?fbid=122159075444021583&set=a.122113312946021583

2. Replace ALL current images in /workspace/shadcn-ui/public/assets/ with real downloaded photos

3. Verify menu content accuracy - check what they ACTUALLY serve:
   - Coffee offerings (specialty coffee, specific types)
   - Pastries and desserts (cheesecakes, cakes, specific items)
   - Ceramic workshop details
   - Cultural events and art workshops
   Update translations in all language files (pl.json, uk.json, en.json, tr.json) to reflect ONLY what they actually offer

4. Test that all images load correctly in the website

**Important:**
- Use ONLY real photos from their social media - NO AI-generated images
- Do NOT add menu items they don't actually serve
- Ensure image file names match what's referenced in components (Hero.tsx, Gallery.tsx, Menu.tsx)
- Keep GitHub Pages compatibility

The plan has been confirmed with the user. No need to ask human or draft plan again. Proceed directly.
